name: The Last Crystal Co-op Adventure - Demo
name_original: The Last Crystal Co-op Adventure - Demo
description:
Kickstarter LIVE on May 5th

https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/marc477/the-last-crystal-an-epic-co-op-adventure?utm_source=itch

The Last Crystal is a co-op adventure game for 1 or 2 players. Team up to explore a dangerous magic temple with its lively forest and dark caves, defeat epic foes, join helpful allies, acquire unique powers and solve enigmatic puzzles to unravel the secrets behind the last and most powerful crystal.

On a quest to retrieve the last and mightiest crystal, you and your friend arrives at an ancient temple, rumored to be built and guarded by a very powerful wizard named Aechuporith the Great. Only two people are allowed to enter the temple at one time. You have to prove yourselves worthy of the last crystal by overcoming many challenges together as a team. Thousands of previous explorers had failed miserably and were punished with terrible curses. Will you be the one to succeed? Now, it’s your turn.

Unique co-op mechanics: Team up with a friend and work together to solve challenging puzzles and fight epic monsters. Discover various weapons and powers. For a challenge, you can play solo by controlling both characters at once. If you want to go fast, go alone. If you want to go far, go together.

Many open areas to explore: the ancient temple, the dark caves, the gleaming forest, the snake pit, the death valley, the mummy sanctum, and more. Each features different enemies to slay and secrets to unravel.

Epic guardian boss fights: The Guardians of the Temple are the deadliest of all enemies you will encounter. Among them are the fire beast from hell, the giant eight-leg thousand-eyes and the venomous snake-slash-dragon. Take on these epic challenges with help from your allies, a lot of courage, a little luck, and the power of friendship.

Helpful allies: Besides enemies and monsters to slay, you will also encounter many unusual temple inhabitants who will aid you in your quest. Befriend the ‘see-in-the-dark’ sheep, the lost panda, the eccentric bird, and the ghost archeologist.


Weapons, upgrades and powers: There are various types of weapons to be discovered and collected. Some can be used individually, while others need to be used cooperatively by both of you. Each character will be able to unlock their own unique skills, making each member of the team valuable. Weapons can be upgraded too, so you will get stronger and better the more you play.
